about_the_game:
You wake up to find that your beloved kittens have gone missing. Desperate to find them, you follow a mysterious scent that leads you to a decrepit, gloomy house. As you venture inside, you realize that this is no ordinary house - it is filled with foreboding stench that obstructs your senses, as you continue to progress you find yourself in the presence of malevolent entities that threaten not only your own life, but the lives of your offspring.

You must use all of your feline senses and stealth to navigate the twisted corridors and evade the dangers that lurk within. Every step is a test of your survival skills as you try to uncover the mystery of what has happened to your kittens and how you can rescue them from the malevolent forces that hold them captive.

Inspired by the games Visage and Stray, this psychological horror game delves into the disturbing themes of animal abuse and supernatural terror. Can you use your wits and determination to rescue your kittens and escape the clutches of the darkness that surrounds you? The fate of your family is in your hands.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistic depictions of violence, which can be very disturbing. Also note that some of its themes revolve around animal abuse and neglect. Some of its content may not be appropriate for all ages. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700

short_description: Uncover the dark secrets of an abandoned house as you search for your missing kittens in Broken Tails, a psychological horror exploration game. Use your stealth and wit to evade malevolent beings and unravel the disturbing story of animal neglect and other dark themes in this atmospheric experience
